option.od: print the help message and exit.
replace the time in the data file with the actual time.
send the re-open file message every time the interval hr:mn elapses.
synchronize the scan time to the interval hr:mn.
force the integration period to be intt seconds.
force the station identifier to be set to that of radar station.
list of task names to send the data to.
name of the data file to open.
data is in the fitacf or rawacf format only.
the data file is a raw ACF file.

synopsis.p: Feed data to the data processing tasks from a file.
